intro.text: Hello, I'm Shelly. I'm a ux and industrial designer in Toronto.
intro.heading: Intro

about.heading: About me
about.p1: I began as an industrial designer, where I found my passion for design. I learned to understand the relationship between people and products, always putting users at the core of design problem-solving.
about.p2: My path took an exciting turn when I had the opportunity to explore UX/UI design in a previous role. This experience made me realize that both UX design and industrial design have the same passion ‚ù§Ô∏èüî• for making the world a better place for people.
about.p3: While learning this new, more technical skill initially felt daunting and challenging, I quickly fell in love with the impact of effective UX design. Since then, I made the decision to pursue further studies in UX design and eventually embarked on my journey as a UX designer.

projects.title: Building Block
projects.description: A project that redesigns and develops a platform to support students in developing foreign language skills.

projects.title: Gear
projects.description: Redesigns the entire assessment platform for the university students.

projects.title: Forward Motion Yoga
projects.description: The project helps an actual client redesign the website of a yoga studio.

projects.title: Wild House
projects.description: This is a capstone project in a graduate program. I designed a website focused on educating potential and current pet owners about the behavior of pet reptiles.

footer.text: Built with Next.js(14.0.3), Typescript, Tailwindcss, Framer Motion & Resend.
